content.rendered:
Directed by Vikram Bhatt.

Written by Shagufta Rafique.

Cast Emraan Hashmi(Raghuram Rathod / Mr. X). Amyra Dastur(Siya Verma). Tanmay Bhat(Popo). Sushil Pandey(Tiwari) . Samir Chandra(Scientist). Gurmeet Choudhary(Dancer). Nora Fatehi(Dancer). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal(Devraj Verma). Umar Raza Khan(Senior Officer). Wasim Khan(Driver). Atul Mathur(Terrorist). Aarav Mishra(Serial Killer).Karan Sharma. Mohit Sheoran(Police Constable). Arunoday Singh(ACP Bhardwaj). Shruti Ulfat(Madhuri). Mr. Xherlie(Self – Mr. X (voice) (as Mr. X) (credit only)). S.M. Zaheer(Minister)

Language Hindi.

Producers Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Mehboob Bawa. Mukesh Bhatt. Sakshi Bhatt. Vishesh Bhatt. Noorie Hassan. Sumit Sabharwal. Kumkum Saigal.

Production Vishesh Films.
